column4: I'm not a unity fan... can anyone tell me how I can change the look and feel back to classic? I'm using 11.10
as in what you have in 10.04?
when you login - enter you p/w you will have the option
waht is the pint of doing all of that?
As insectatorious stated, you can choose it at login
no worries, keep in mind that you can only change to desktop env that have been installed, so if you want the gnome-panel you will have to install it via the Software Center

the entire Gnome dektop env has been upgraded in 11.10
